glossary_apy: Annual Percentage Yield is the compounding interest you earn in a year.
glossary_vault: A vault is a smart contract that automates strategies to earn passive yield.
glossary_impermanent loss: A temporary loss of funds caused by volatility in liquidity pools.
glossary_staking: Locking tokens to earn rewards and support a blockchain.
glossary_lp token: Represents your share in a liquidity pool.
glossary_tvl: Total Value Locked — how much capital is deposited in a protocol.
glossary_slippage: The difference between expected and executed trade prices.
